DOC.brief_summary: The purposes of this study are to evaluate the safety and tolerability and to model the single-dose pharmacokinetic profile of indomethacin capsules low dose and high dose in children ages 6 to <17 years experiencing mild to moderate acute postoperative pain.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Indomethacin Capsules to Treat Pain Following Surgery in Children Ages 6 to <17 Years of Age
